text: @realDonaldTrump WHERE THE HELL ARE OUR TAX REFUNDS & STIMULUS CHECKS?  WHY IS THE IRS NOT WORKING?  PICK UP THE DAMN PHONES AND GET BACK TO WORK IRS!  Americans need to cut all pay to congress and Senate until the IRS is caught back up and answering phones.  STOP PAYING TAXES.  Enough! #COVID19
